definition: heliocentric theory/the theory that the sun is at the center of the universe
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: The final triumph of this idea is commonly called the Copernicus Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 日心說思想的最終勝利普遍被稱爲哥白尼革命。

sentences.english: The popular acceptance of the heliocentric theory took a long time.
sentences.chinese: 日心說的確立歷經了漫長的時日。
